name: personal-history-archive
description: A server and browser extension for saving a personal archive
author: Ian Bicking <ian@ianbicking.org>

scripts.start: mkdir -p dev-data && python -m pha.saver --script-location dev-data/pha-saver-script.py --native-name pha.saver.dev dev-data/ && NATIVE_SCRIPT=pha.saver.dev LOG_LEVEL=debug SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=debug TESTING_BROWSER=1 DEST=dev-data npm run build && web-ext run -f nightly -s dev-data/extension/ --browser-console
scripts.build:zip: web-ext build --source-dir ${DEST:-build}/extension/ --ignore-files '**/README.md' --ignore-files '**/*.template' --overwrite-dest && mv web-ext-artifacts/personal_history_saver*.zip ${DEST:-build}/extension.zip && rmdir web-ext-artifacts || true
scripts.build: mkdir -p ${DEST:-build} && cp -r extension/ ${DEST:-build}/extension && mkdir -p ${DEST:-build}/extension/build && python python/pha/sub-env-vars.py < extension/buildSettings.js.tmpl > ${DEST:-build}/extension/build/buildSettings.js
scripts.test: npm run test:build-data && npm run test:build-ext && npm run test:selenium
scripts.test:build-ext: NATIVE_SCRIPT=pha.saver.test IDLE_WAIT_TIME=0 HISTORY_PAUSE=0 LOG_LEVEL=debug SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=debug TESTING_BROWSER=1 DEST=test/build/ npm run build && DEST=test/build/ npm run build:zip && python -m pha.saver --script-location test/test-data/pha-saver-script.py --native-name pha.saver.test test/test-data/
